title: Regulation (EEC) No 458/72 of the Commission of 2 March 1972 amending the Annexes to Regulations (EEC) Nos 1559/70, 1560/70, 1561/70 and 1562/70 of 31 July 1970 and (EEC) No 55/72 of 12 January 1972
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 458/72 OF THE COMMISSION  of 2 March 1972  amending the Annexes to Regulations (EEC) Nos 1559/70, 1560/70, 1561/70 and 1562/70 of 31 July 1970 and (EEC) No 55/72 of 12 January 1972
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annexes to Regulations (EEC) Nos 1559/70, 1560/70, 1561/70, 1562/70 and 55/72, the following shall be substituted for the address of the agency appointed by Belgium:
rue de Trèves 82,
1040 Bruxelles.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 March 1972.
For the Commission
The President
Franco M. MALFATTI  1OJ No 192, 27.10.1966, p. 3286/66. 2OJ No L 151, 7.7.1971, p. 1. 3OJ No L 169, 1.8.1970, p. 55. 4OJ No L 169, 1.8.1970, p. 59. 5OJ No L 169, 1.8.1970, p. 63. 6OJ No L 169, 1.8.1970, p. 67. 7OJ No L 9, 12.1.1972, p. 1.
